# News comment title:
EXCLUSIVE: Tea Party Patriots Smashes Rubio, Likens Immigration Push to Pelosi's Obamacare Passage

# Oldest comment (from the thread):
why would we want to import poverty, crime, unemployment and the uneducated when we have plenty of our own?
why would we want to import tens of millions of unskilled workers when our economy needs fewer of them each year?
why would we want to import tens of millions of welfare/foodstamp/obamacare recipients when we cant afford the ones we already have?
why would we want to import tens of millions of workers to the job market when we already have millions of Americans unemployed?
why do we keep stuffing Americas schools with millions of imported remedial students who cant even speak the language at the expense of American kids and taxpayers?

No Amnesty.

repel and deport the illegal alien/immigrant/foreign invaders.

# Most liked comment (from the thread):
How about before passing new laws, we enforce the ones we already have?

>>> COMMENT UNDER ANALYSIS<<<


This bill will not only drive us to debt, but this will be the DEATH of the US as we've known it. This country will be another third world country populated by Latin American illegals who are mostly Mexico's uneducated; illiterate and criminal thugs, Instead of sending this lawbreakers back to where they came from, Rubio, the traitor wants to reward them with AMNESTY? We should all rise up and throw this bum out! When's the next big rally against this Gangster thugs of 8???? I'll be there!!
